title: Early Cambrian crown-group crustacean analysis
procedures:
1. Collect fossiliferous carbonate nodules sandwiched in black shales.
  2. Disolute the nodules in dilute \(5%) acetic acid solution to obtain insoluble residue.
  3. Pick up tiny fossils from the residue under a stereomicroscope.
  4. Examine and photograph via a scanning electron mcroscope.
